name: R-09 Vision
details:
Dual channel modulation pedalJOYO R-09 VISION is a dual channel modulation pedal, supporting stereo input and output.
Both of the two effects have independent SPEED/RATE, CONTROL, and DEPTH/MIX knobs.
In the middle of the panel, a 3-position toggle switch is used for choosing the sequence of the two effects’ output.
Each channel features 9 effects, you can adjust various tones with the independent Tap Tempo control.
True bypass design minimizes tone loss.

https://www.joyoaudio.co.uk/JOYO-Vision-Dual-Modulation
